name: fetch-cookie
description: Decorator for a `fetch` function to support automatic cookies.
author: ValÃ©rian Galliat (http://val.codejam.info)

scripts.build: for format in esm cjs; do esbuild src/*.ts --format=$format --outdir=$format; done
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run type-declarations
scripts.prepack: npm run prepare && npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm test
scripts.type-declarations: tsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly src/*.ts --outDir types && echo 'export = fetchCookie;' >> types/index.d.ts
